mapper.select:
SELECT pc.*,f.fleetName,d.driverName,c.plateNo from t_passenger_comment pc LEFT JOIN t_system_fleet f ON f.id = pc.fleetId LEFT JOIN t_archives_driver d ON d.id = pc.driverId LEFT JOIN t_archives_car c ON c.id = pc.plateNoId WHERE 1=1
AND fleetId =#{fleetId}
AND pc.driverId in (SELECT id FROM t_archives_driver WHERE driverName LIKE '%${driverName}%')
AND pc.plateNoId in (SELECT id FROM t_archives_car WHERE plateNo LIKE '%${plateNo}%')
